message.content:
1. A clinical trial was conducted to evaluate the effects of probiotic (VSL#3) and omega-3 fatty acid.
2. The trial aimed to study the impact on insulin sensitivity, blood lipids, and inflammation.
3. The trial involved 60 participants.
4. All participants in the trial were overweight.
5. Overweight in this context is defined as having a BMI greater than 25.
6. All participants in the trial were healthy adults.
7. The age range of the participants was 40–60 years.

messages.content:
Statement: To evaluate the effects of probiotic (VSL#3) and omega-3 fatty acid on insulin sensitivity, blood lipids, and inflammation, we conducted a clinical trial in 60 overweight (BMI > 25), healthy adults, aged 40–60 years.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
